location.name: The Fresh Food Co. at West Campus

menu_items.name: Vegan Whole Wheat Pancakes
menu_items.ingredients: Soy Milk (RH Hood: organic soymilk [filtered water, organic soybeans], organic cane sugar, calcium carbonate, sea salt,  natural flavors, gellan gum, vitamin A palmitate, vitamin D2, riboflavin [vitamin B2] and vitamin B12) (Silk: organic soymilk [filtered water, organic soybeans],vitamin and mineral blend [calcium carbonate, vitamin a palmitate, vitamin d2, riboflavin [b2], vitamin b12], sea salt, gellan gum, ascorbic acid [to protect freshness], natural flavor), Whole Wheat Flour (whole wheat flour), Vegetable Olive Oil Blend (Arrezzio: 90% soybean oil, 10% olive pomace oil) (Spagnolla: vegetable oil [may contain one or more of the following: soybean and/or canola and/or corn oil, and/or sunflower oil], olive oil, beta-carotene), White Sugar, Double Acting Baking Powder (corn starch, sodium bicarbonate, monocalcium phosphate), Kosher Salt (salt, yellow prussiate of soda [YPS]).

menu_items.name: Vegan Omelet
menu_items.description: Just Eggs with sautéed mushrooms, peppers, onion,  tomato, broccoli, cheddar cheese
menu_items.ingredients: Egg Replacer (potato starch, tapioca flour, leavening [calcium lactate, calcium carbonate, cream of tartar], cellulose gum, modified cellulose), Vegan Cheddar Cheese (filtered water, tapioca starch, coconut oil, non-GMO expeller pressed canola and/or safflower oil, vegan natural flavors, sea salt, tricalcium phosphate, potato maltodextrin, potato protein isolate, lactic acid [vegan], konjac gum, xanthan gum, yeast extract, annatto [color], turmeric [color], inactive yeast, potassium chloride), Yellow Onion, Green Bell Pepper, Broccoli, Fresh Mushrooms, Red Tomatoes.

menu_items.name: Vegan Belgian Waffle
menu_items.description: Golden brown Vegan waffle
menu_items.ingredients: Tap Water, Gluten-Free Pancake Mix (white rice flour, degerminated yellow corn flour, soy flour, sugar, monocalcium phosphate, sodium bicarbonate, salt, cornstarch, natural vanilla flavor, xanthan gum), Highly Refined Sunflower Oil Pan Spray (sunflower oil, sunflower lecithin propellant).

menu_items.name: Scrambled Eggs
menu_items.description: Cage Free egs scrambled with salt and pepper
menu_items.ingredients: Liquid Whole Egg (whole eggs, citric acid, 0.15% water added as carrier for citric acid. citric acid added to preserve color), Kosher Salt (salt, yellow prussiate of soda [YPS]), Ground Black Pepper.

menu_items.name: Bacon
menu_items.description: Crisp, lightly smoked bacon strips
menu_items.ingredients: Bacon Sliced (Armour: cured with: water, salt, sugar, sodium phosphates, sodium erythorbate, sodium nitrite) (Hormel: pork, water, sea salt, contains less than 2% of the following: cane sugar, celery powder).

menu_items.name: French Toast
menu_items.description: Golden brown and fluffy cinnamon-spiced thick-cut French toast
menu_items.ingredients: Texas Toast (enriched flour [wheat flour unbleached, malted barley flour, niacin, reduced iron, thiamin mononitrate, riboflavin, folic acid], water, sugar, soybean oil, contains less than 2% of : calcium propionate, corn flour, turmeric, mono-& diglycerides, paprika, natural & artificial flavors, monoglycerides, propionic acid, phosphoric acid, ascorbic acid, wheat gluten, enzymes, salt, yeast), Liquid Whole Egg (whole eggs, citric acid, 0.15% water added as carrier for citric acid. citric acid added to preserve color), 2% Milk (reduced fat milk, ascorbic acid [vitamin C], vitamin A palmitate and vitamin D3), White Sugar, Imitation Vanilla Extract (water, caramel color, vanillin, ethyl vanillin, and 0.1% potassium sorbate [added as a preservative]), Ground Cinnamon, Ground Nutmeg (nutmeg).

menu_items.name: Hash Brown Potatoes
menu_items.description: Pan-fried seasoned diced potatoes
